name: Kevin Conroy
info:
• 简体中文名: 凯文 康瑞
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1955年11月30日
detail: Kevin Conroy (born November 30, 1955) is an American stage, screen, and voice actor, known for his acclaimed voice role as the DC Comics character Batman in the 1990s Warner Bros. television show Batman: The Animated Series, as well as its various spin-off TV series and feature films that made up the DC animated universe.He has also voiced Batman in the acclaimed Batman: Arkham video game series, as well as various films under the DC Universe Animated Original Movies banner.
